alert.note: Alert for Boone County Except Southwest (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 5:27PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Boone County through 600 PM CDT... At 527 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Roberson Hollow, or 15 miles east of Berryville, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Omaha... Roberson Hollow... Crumpler Subdivision... New Hope in Boone County... Burlington... Bull Shoals Lake... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
